Junco de la Vega S/N, Tecnológico, Monterrey, Nuevo León, México. CP. 64849.

The Tecnológico stadium was opened july 17, 1950 by mexican presiden Miguel Alemán Valdés. The original construction had a 19,000 people capacity, it was then extended to 35,000 in 1965. In 1986, the stadium was home of the World Cup celebrated in Mexico. Today it hosts important soccer matches and college footbal team "Borregos Salvajes" from Tec de Monterrey, Campus Monterrey.
